job.title: Community Planning Support Officer
job.description:
Are you an organised and detail-oriented professional with a passion for supporting community infrastructure projects? The City of Karratha is seeking a Community Planning Support Officer to join our dedicated team and help deliver impactful projects that enhance our community’s future.

About the Role

This position will assist the Community Planning Team throughout the entire community infrastructure project lifecycle, from inception to final design brief handover, ensuring adherence to contemporary project management practices.

The Community Planning Support Officer will be responsible for supporting procurement processes, administration tasks, and activities that contribute to the planning and execution of community infrastructure projects.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Assist in the coordination, management, and planning of community infrastructure projects.
  • Support senior staff with planning, investigation, feasibility studies, and design activities to ensure successful community infrastructure project delivery.
  • Actively participate in the development of the Community Planning Team, contributing to the creation of effective policies and procedures.
  • Provide administrative support, including scheduling meetings, preparing agendas and minutes, handling correspondence, records management and following up on outstanding issues, as needed.

Why Join Us?

At the City of Karratha, we pride ourselves on fostering a positive and dynamic work environment where your contributions make a real impact. Here’s what you can look forward to:

  • A collaborative and supportive team culture.
  • The opportunity to work on meaningful projects that benefit the community.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Professional development and career growth opportunities.

What We’re Looking For

  • Previous experience in a similar role within a dynamic organisation
  • Previous experience in technical construction and contract administration is desirable

If you’re eager to contribute to meaningful community projects and work in a dynamic environment, we want to hear from you! Apply today and be part of a team that’s shaping the future of the City of Karratha.
